title: of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 437 of 2020)), hereby
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Maternity Protection
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Maternity Protection 
(Protection of Mothers who are Breastfeeding) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 3rd day of July 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited maternity protection (protection mother breastfeeding) (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 3rd day july 2023

title: of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 437 of 2020)), hereby
heading: 2. The Maternity Protection (Protection of Mothers who are Breastfeeding)
text_raw:
2. The Maternity Protection (Protection of Mothers who are Breastfeeding) 
Regulations 2004 (S.I. No. 654 of 2004) are amended by the substitution of the 
following definition for the definition of “employee who is breastfeeding”: 

“ ‘employee who is breastfeeding’ has the same meaning as it has in 
section 2(1) (as amended by section 34(a) of the Work Life Balance and 
Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 8 of 2023)) of the Principal Act;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 June, 2023. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [342] 3
